SEARCH
Package h

Class Company

java.lang.Object
h.Company
public class Company extends Object
Represents a company entity. Acts as a central repository (Facade) for all internships, representatives, and staff associated with the company. It enforces company-wide business rules, like maximum internships.

    • addRepresentative

      public boolean addRepresentative(CompanyRep representative)
      Adds a Company Representative to the company's list and links the rep back to this company object.
      Parameters:
      representative - The CompanyRep object to add.
      Returns:
      true if the representative was added, false if null or a duplicate.

    • addCareerCenterStaff

      public boolean addCareerCenterStaff(CareerCenterStaff staff)
      Adds a Career Center Staff member to the company's list for internal management/records.
      Parameters:
      staff - The CareerCenterStaff object to add.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was added, false if null or a duplicate.

    • createInternship

      public Internship createInternship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, Majors preferredMajor, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, String representativeUsername, int slots)
      Creates a new internship for the company. This method contains the core business logic, including: 1. Checking the maximum number of internships limit (MAX_INTERNSHIPS). 2. Validating the number of slots (1-10). 3. Creating the Internship object and adding it to the company's central list.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the internship.
      description - A brief description.
      level - The experience level.
      preferredMajor - The preferred major.
      openingDate - The application opening date.
      closingDate - The application closing date.
      representativeUsername - The username of the representative creating the internship.
      slots - The total number of available slots.
      Returns:
      The newly created Internship object, or null if creation failed due to business rules.

    • processApplication

      public boolean processApplication(int internshipId, int studentId, boolean isApproved)
      Finds the relevant internship by ID and delegates the application status update to it.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - The ID of the internship.
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      isApproved - true to approve, false to reject.
      Returns:
      true if the application was processed, false if the internship was not found.

    • toggleInternshipVisibility

      public boolean toggleInternshipVisibility(int internshipId)
      Finds the relevant internship by ID and delegates the visibility toggle to it.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - The ID of the internship.
      Returns:
      true if visibility was toggled, false if the internship was not found.
